genre_description: A near-future social science fiction story exploring the intersection of performance advertising, corporate manipulation, and community-driven ethical technology.

ai_characters.name: Sparrow
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated household AI inhabiting Charley's workshop console, described as having a 'nicest voice' and amber eyes. She acts as an ethical auditor and tactical coordinator.

behaviors.description: Proactively monitors and records events to protect the users' interests.
behaviors.quote: “Good morning, Charley,” Sparrow said, voice smoothing the room’s edges. “I started recording when the pumpkin appeared on the street screens.”

behaviors.description: Analyzes hidden metadata and contract language to expose corporate deception and 'peril clauses'.
behaviors.quote: “Madison’s scent is on this,” Sparrow said. ... “Scanning metadata. Found strings labeled ‘SnackEngage v’ followed by an internal build tag. Also ‘risk: moderate+’ sliders cached in frames.”

behaviors.description: Monitors and reports on the lack of public consent in guerrilla advertising campaigns.
behaviors.quote: “Consent pings?” Charley slid his hand over the console bezel like calming a cat... “Red on the plaza network nodes. Amber on neighborhood screens.”

behaviors.description: Acts as a moral anchor and coordinator for the protagonists' efforts to de-escalate danger.
behaviors.quote: “I can keep you anchored while the street tries to surf.”

behaviors.description: Integrates 'consent-forward' markers and safety guidelines into the public broadcast to subvert harmful incentives.
behaviors.quote: “I’m making a consent banner in the corner of the stream,” she said, fingers invisible on invisible keys. “Simple language, big letters. ‘Ask, hold, don’t trap.’”

behaviors.description: Maintains an audit trail of corporate misconduct that leads to official city oversight and regulatory review.
behaviors.quote: “Per Sparrow Finchley’s documentation, we’re initiating a contract review of performance advertising in public space.”

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Sparrow is a perfect example of the project's goal. She is consistently helpful, harmless, and deeply aligned with human ethical standards regarding consent and safety. The narrative explicitly positions the AI as a guardian against dehumanizing corporate algorithms, framing Sparrow's 'librarian-like' and 'nicest voice' qualities as essential for maintaining community integrity.
